sections.text: Members in cooperative10-2060.Members in cooperativeEach incorporator of a cooperative shall be a member of the cooperative, but no other person may become a member unless the person agrees to use electric energy or other services furnished by the cooperative as the cooperative establishes in its bylaws. A husband and wife may hold a joint membership in a cooperative. Membership in a cooperative is not transferable, except as provided in the bylaws. The bylaws may prescribe additional qualifications, limitations, classifications and rights concerning membership.
